name: Jimmy's Fish
description:
Oh Noes! Jimmy's Parents bought his fish! WOW! Jimmy has named his fish Fishy T. Fish! WOW! But here's the problem. Jimmy asked you to watch Fishy while he would get fish food at the pet store. BUT.....  You got bored of watching Fishy, so you start playing on your GamerBoy™. But then you rage at MoRiO so you chuck your GamerBoy™, but it ends up in Fishy's fish bowl! The GamerBoy™ short-circuits from the water and it fry's the fish. Now Jimmy Is MAD. And I Mean MAD. Welp, Good luck with Jimmy. 

hehehehhehehehehehe

FullScreen recomended
